name: Chapter 15: New Horizons
short_description: With the mission complete, the Enterprise bids farewell to the Codarians. Captain Picard and his crew embark on their next adventure, carrying with them newfound knowledge and allies.
people: Captain Picard, Commander Riker, Data, Codarian leaders
from_prev_chapter: The Enterprise prepares to depart, leaving a path open for future collaboration with the Codarians.
